cardsView.tagDescription: This report is for the last 7 days [ from 5/8 to 5/14].  The majority of the reported issues are due to application configuration issues
A significant portion of incidents are P2 and P3. Blocking portion of test cases.

data.value3: Application was using old image repo that was shut down several months ago.
data.value4:
Empty Repos created for TMAG and TPOS teams. SCCS Platform team worked on generating needed configs to restore the apps.
 SCCS platform team identified other applications in NPE having similar issues. They are remediating all apps that have orphaned SCCS servers.
